Class RegisterEmployeeUI

java.lang.Object
app.ui.console.RegisterEmployeeUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class RegisterEmployeeUI extends Object implements Runnable
This class is the user interface the user will interact to register a new employee.

    • dataPrinting

      public void dataPrinting(String name, String address, int phoneNumber, String email, int citizenCardNumber, EmployeeRole employeeRole)
      This function shows all the data entered by the user.
      Parameters:
      name - the variable name holds the name of the employee.
      address - the variable address holds the address of the employee.
      phoneNumber - the variable phoneNumber holds the phone number of the employee.
      email - the variable email holds the e-mail of the employee.
      citizenCardNumber - the variable citizenCardNumber holds the citizen card number of the employee.
      employeeRole - the variable employeeRole holds the id and designation of the role.

    • askForConfirmation

      public void askForConfirmation(RegisterEmployeeController controller)
      This function asks for confirmation, if the user aproves it, the function will save the data, if not it won't.
      Parameters:
      controller - represents the controller.
